title: Deepika Padukone teaching James Corden the Lungi Dance will leave you in splits – watch video
text:
Deepika Padukone, Urvashi Rautela, Kriti Sanon-meet the worst dressed celebs this week 
Deepika Padukone is becoming a known face in the West thanks to her Hollywood debut film. After seeing Deepika’s first pictures from the sets of The Late Late Show all we can say is we just cant wait for the episode to go on air. And now, a small video clip has come out which has Deepika doing the Lungi Dance on the show. Sounds hilarious, no? But its true. The actress is seen teaching James Corden, the host of the show some funky steps as they go on to do the Lungi Dance. The video will sure have you in splits! 
After appearing on The Ellen DeGenres Show, DP is all set to make an impressive debut on The Late Late Show and we are sure of that! As soon as the host says “The Lungi Dance” the crowd burst into a loud cheer! They went mad, literally! So Deepika then went on to explain what exactly the Lungi Dance and the lungi is all about. “A lungi is actually a garment that we wear.. the men wear in India and I did a movie about two years ago where in the movie we came up with the song called ‘Lungi Dance’ where we wear the lungi and dance.” She also took a dig at Vin when she went on to say that “Vin has been doing interviews in India very seriously about the lungi dance versus the break dance” and once again the crowd rolled! Woah! After watching the video, all we can say is this one is gonna be one helluva entertainer.. (ALSO READ: These 5 things said by Deepika Padukone prove she’s obsessed with Vin Diesel ) 
For her first American TV show, Dippi looked pretty nervous around Ellen. However, this time, she looks more confident and calm. Way to go, Deepika! The actress is gonna be appearing on the show with her co-star Vin Diesel and looks fabulous in her outfit. Well, this is what you call power dressing, ladies! 
The stunning diva’s Hollywood debut film xXx: The Return of Xander Cage has already released in India and the film will be releasing internationally January 20.
